thread.section_title: Orbit Fitness Equipment Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Orbit Fitness Equipment | www.orbitfitness.com.au
thread.title: Danielle
thread.title_full: Orbit Fitness Equipment reviewed by Danielle

author: Danielle
title: Danielle
text:
Just as the title says, I'm still waiting for my order for the past ~3 weeks, which the status is still "pending". What really annoys me is that my card was already charged for the purchase, and yet the order is still "pending" :(
Update:
After emailing orbit fitness the order was received promptly!
